Reading through these comments, I see a remarkable socio-cultural clash theme emerging between the US and... the Dutch! The US expresses a sense of entitlement to sit in judgement on all local matters for debate, while demanding moral compliance with accepted rights & liberties. The Dutch simply react with an alternative logic based on underlying progressive values that accept social plurality, under whatever name.

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them. Just when you think it's all clear and danger-free there is still trouble and possible threats to safety.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes man ! My meter was off by 4/5 because there were mostly 2 minutes scenes and I forced myself to add one more couple. If you’re into “emo” and “sad boi” that’s your thing. The music and butterflies are cool though.
